verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> as I <S%H7311>exalted<s%> thee out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> thee <S%H5057>prince<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and hast <S%H853>made<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H2403>sins;<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will take <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H310>posterity<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and the <S%H310>posterity<s%> of his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat.<s%>

Him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%> and him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> of his in the <S%H7704>fields<s%> shall the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

So <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah:<s%> and <S%H425>Elah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> even <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in provoking him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in <S%H1961>being<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam;<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H5221>killed<s%> him.

In the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8337>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> two <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H4276>half<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, as <S%H1931>he<s%> was in <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H777>Arza<s%> <S%H5921>steward<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him, in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> as soon as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> that he <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha:<s%> he <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> one that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against a <S%H7023>wall,<s%> neither of his <S%H1350>kinsfolk,<s%> nor of his <S%H7453>friends.<s%>

Thus did <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%>

For <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and by <S%H834>which<s%> they made Israel to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478><s%> in <S%H3707>provoking<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to anger with their <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

In the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> did <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> hath <S%H7194>conspired,<s%> and hath <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> wherefore <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H6018>Omri<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3920>taken,<s%> that he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H759>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%>

For <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> to make Israel to <S%H2398>sin.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478><s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> and his <S%H7195>treason<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H7194>wrought,<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> were the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> into two <S%H2677>parts:<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath,<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> prevailed <S%H2388>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath:<s%> so <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned.<s%>

In the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began <S%H6018>Omri<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And he <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H8106>Shemer<s%> for two <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and built <S%H1129>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built,<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer,<s%> <S%H113>owner<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

But <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and did <S%H7489>worse<s%> than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

For he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> he made Israel to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478><s%> to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to anger with their <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>showed,<s%> are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

So <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And in the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as if it had been a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> for him to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> that he <S%H3947>took<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H856>Ethbaal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> him.
And he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H842>grove;<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to anger than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> did <S%H2419>Hiel<s%> the <S%H1017>Bethelite<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> he laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> thereof in <S%H48>Abiram<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and set <S%H5324>up<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> thereof in his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son <S%H7687>Segub,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
